analytic.title: Isotopic and Artistic Analysis of Corinthian Marble Capitals from Caesarea: A Case Study

monogr.title: Caesarea Papers: Straton’s Tower, Herod’s Harbour, and Roman and Byzantine Caesarea. Including the Papers Given at the Symposium Held at the University of Maryland, the Smithsonian Institution, and the Jewish Community Center of Greater Washington on 25-28 March, 1988

body.bibl: Fischer, Moshe L., M. Magaritz, and Ze’ev Pearl. “Isotopic and Artistic Analysis of Corinthian Marble Capitals from Caesarea: A Case Study.” In Caesarea Papers: Straton’s Tower, Herod’s Harbour, and Roman and Byzantine Caesarea. Including the Papers Given at the Symposium Held at the University of Maryland, the Smithsonian Institution, and the Jewish Community Center of Greater Washington on 25-28 March, 1988, edited by R. Lindley Vann, 214–21. Journal of Roman Archaeology Supplement 5. Ann Arbor, MI: Journal of Roman Archaeology, 1992.

Moshe L. Fischer, M. Magaritz, and Ze’ev Pearl, Isotopic and Artistic Analysis of Corinthian Marble Capitals from Caesarea: A Case Study, in Caesarea Papers: Straton’s Tower, Herod’s Harbour, and Roman and Byzantine Caesarea. Including the Papers Given at the Symposium Held at the University of Maryland, the Smithsonian Institution, and the Jewish Community Center of Greater Washington on 25-28 March, 1988, ed. R. Lindley Vann, Journal of Roman Archaeology Supplement 5 (Ann Arbor, MI: Journal of Roman Archaeology, 1992), 214–21.
